import React from "react"; import { Link, Redirect } from "react-router-dom"; import "../style.css"; import { userLogin } from "../Actions/userAction"; //import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import axios from "axios"; class Nav extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); } state = { isLoggedIn: false, fullname: "", email: "", password: "", error: "" }; handle_Register = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value, isRegistered: false }); }; handle_Providerlogin = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; handle_Adminlogin = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; handle_Submituser = e => { e.preventDefault(); axios .post("http://localhost:3001/user/signup", { fullname: this.state.fullname, email: this.state.email, password: this.state.password }) .then(data => { //alert('Login success!); console.log(data); this.props.userLogin(); this.setState({ isLoggedIn: true }); }) .catch(err => { if (err) { this.setState({ error: err.response.data }); } }); }; handle_Submit = e => { e.preventDefault(); }; render() { return (
